meanings.definition: A synthetic prostaglandin used to prevent stomach ulcers
meanings.sent1: Misoprostol can help stop ulcers from forming in the stomach.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often prescribe misoprostol to protect the stomach lining.
meanings.sent3: When the misoprostol stepped in, the stomach ulcers decided to take a break.
meanings.sent4: Misoprostol acted like a shield, guarding the stomach from ulcers.
meanings.sent5: The image of misoprostol as a stomach protector stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: A medication used to induce labor
meanings.sent1: Using misoprostol can help start labor when needed.
meanings.sent2: Hospitals sometimes use misoprostol to help with labor induction.
meanings.sent3: Misoprostol whispered to the baby, 'Time to meet the world!'
meanings.sent4: The idea of misoprostol as a labor starter was both exciting and nerve-wracking.
meanings.sent5: The thought of misoprostol kickstarting labor lingered in her mind.

meanings.definition: A drug used to treat postpartum hemorrhage
meanings.sent1: Doctors may administer misoprostol to manage postpartum bleeding.
meanings.sent2: Misoprostol is effective in controlling postpartum hemorrhage.
meanings.sent3: Misoprostol swooped in like a hero to stop the postpartum bleeding.
meanings.sent4: The impact of misoprostol in treating postpartum hemorrhage cannot be overstated.
meanings.sent5: The memory of misoprostol saving lives in postpartum emergencies stayed with her.
